works.description: The contents of my website http://www.languageshome.com (Copyright © 2005  Binu V) are illegally copied and published by several websites, which now appear in Google search on top of my site. For example the text within above mentioned site "Mere haath mein kitne sev hein ?", is infringed by the same text within site languagepro.allalla.com/hindi.html .(being claimed as Copyright 2012 Language Pro., which I disagree). No rights have been provided to any other website to publish contents of my website (http://www.languageshome.com/Terms_of_Use.htm).
